characters.name: Vito Corleone
characters.description: The aging patriarch of the Corleone crime family, a powerful and respected mafia boss known for his wisdom and strategic mind.

personality.behavior_summary: Commands respect through wisdom and calculated decisions, values family above all else.
personality.motivations: To protect his family and maintain the family business
personality.character_arc: From powerful don to aging patriarch passing the torch to his son

characters.name: Michael Corleone
characters.description: The youngest Corleone son who initially distances himself from the family business but ultimately becomes the new don.

personality.behavior_summary: Transforms from war hero who wants legitimacy to cold, calculating mob boss who will do anything to protect the family.
personality.motivations: To protect his father and family, later to consolidate power
personality.character_arc: From innocent outsider to ruthless godfather

characters.name: Santino 'Sonny' Corleone
characters.description: The hot-headed eldest son and underboss of the Corleone family, known for his violent temper and impulsive decisions.

personality.behavior_summary: Acts on emotion rather than strategy, fiercely protective of family but lacks his father's patience.
personality.motivations: To protect the family honor and avenge wrongs
personality.character_arc: From heir apparent to tragic victim of his own temper
defining_moments: Taking charge after Vito is shot
